projects.challenge: Capturing every meaningful moment at an event is incredibly difficult. Hosts are busy, guests take photos on their own devices, and most of those memories never get shared. Important candid moments go unseen, group experiences stay scattered across phones, and you end up chasing people afterward just to collect the highlights.
projects.title: GuestCamera
projects.solution: Our platform makes it effortless for guests to contribute to a live, shared album, giving you all the behind-the-scenes memories you'd otherwise miss. From casual snaps to heartfelt videos, GuestCamera puts all your event photos in one place, so you can focus on making memories, not collecting them.
projects.description: Don't miss a moment. Guestcamera is the simplest way to collect every photo and video from your event. With a single QR code, guests can instantly upload their candid shots to a shared gallery—no apps, accounts, or hassle required. Relive the celebration from every perspective in one central, beautiful album.

projects.challenge: Built a user-friendly UI for Fleet that simplifies property discovery and booking. The design balances aesthetic appeal with functional clarity, offering users a smooth journey from search to stay.
projects.title: Fleet
projects.solution: Designed a clean and intuitive interface for Fleet, a rental platform connecting travelers with unique stays. Focused on seamless navigation, bold visuals, and frictionless booking to elevate the travel experience.
projects.description: Designed a clean and intuitive interface for Fleet, a rental platform connecting travelers with unique stays. Focused on seamless navigation, bold visuals, and frictionless booking to elevate the travel experience.

projects.challenge: Healthcare apps often feel sterile and clinical, causing anxiety for patients. Lumina needed a brand identity that conveyed trust, warmth, and professional competence.
projects.title: Lumina Health
projects.solution: We developed a soft, gradients-based visual language paired with a rounded sans-serif typography to create a sense of calm. The logo symbol combines a cross (health) with a spark (hope), representing the brand's mission to illuminate the path to recovery.
projects.description: Connecting patients with specialists through an intuitive and calming interface.
